thread.title: How Nicki Minaj, Drake, Gucci Mane & Other Hip Hop Stars Rang In 2017
thread.title_full: How Nicki Minaj, Drake, Gucci Mane & Other Hip Hop Stars Rang In 2017

author: D.L. Chandler
title: How Nicki Minaj, Drake, Gucci Mane & Other Hip Hop Stars Rang In 2017

organizations.name: gucci mane & other hip hop stars rang

text:
0 
While Mariah Carey‚Äôs New Year‚Äôs Eve didn‚Äôt go exactly as planned , plenty of celebrities, especially in the realm of Hip Hop, seemed to have a better go of it. Skillz and Uncle Murda both dropped their own versions of the 2016 ‚ÄúRap Up‚Äù just ahead of New Year‚Äôs Eve, but a quick look on social media shows that Hip Hop stars far and wide brought in 2017 in a variety of other ways. 
Nicki Minaj was the guest of honor at Club E11VEN in Miami as a host and performer. No sign of Meek Mill, who was across town at Club Dream. More on that in a bit. üòú A photo posted by Nicki Minaj (@nickiminaj) on Dec 31, 2016 at 8:23pm PST A photo posted by Nicki Minaj (@nickiminaj) on Dec 31, 2016 at 11:32pm PST 
Meanwhile, Meek Mill hosted and performed at South Beach Miami‚Äôs Club Dream, with a photo showing him stunting comfortably on a luxury ride and writing celebratory words for the new year. A photo posted by Meek Mill (@meekmill) on Dec 31, 2016 at 10:14pm PST 
Pharrell Williams didn‚Äôt show off any wild partying but instead shared a thoughtful note. A photo posted by Pharrell Williams (@pharrell) on Dec 31, 2016 at 10:49am PST 
Drake celebrated New Year‚Äôs with a performance in Las Vegas that reportedly drew Jennifer Lopez amid romance rumors between the two. They didn‚Äôt share any photos together this time , with the Canadian superstar instead showing off his dapper look next to some friends. A photo posted by champagnepapi (@champagnepapi) on Dec 31, 2016 at 9:55pm PST 
Busta Rhymes took it to New York City in Times Square and shared a video with the world, along with reposting Epic Records‚Äô posting of his new Swizz Beatz-produced single, ‚ÄúAAAHHHH!!!‚Äù A video posted by Busta Rhymes (@conglomerateent) on Dec 31, 2016 at 11:28pm PST A video posted by Busta Rhymes (@conglomerateent) on Dec 31, 2016 at 11:49pm PST 
Speaking of Swizz Beatz, he posted a very uplifting NYE message via Instagram while his wife, Alicia Keys, got busy on Carson Daly‚Äôs NBC New Year‚Äôs Eve special. A photo posted by therealswizzz (@therealswizzz) on Dec 31, 2016 at 8:42pm PST A photo posted by Alicia Keys (@aliciakeys) on Dec 31, 2016 at 2:06pm PST 
Rap veteran LL Cool J shared his best nine IG photos for the 2016 sendoff. A photo posted by llcoolj (@llcoolj) on Dec 31, 2016 at 1:48pm PST 
Gucci Mane rocked the stages at the Reaction NYE concert in Illinois and shared a photo of himself ahead of his set. A photo posted by Gucci Mane (@laflare1017) on Dec 31, 2016 at 8:31pm PST A video posted by Gucci Mane (@laflare1017) on Dec 31, 2016 at 11:10pm PST 
Jim Jones and Chrissy Lampkin were boatside at an undisclosed location with Capo rapping Lil Uzi Vert‚Äôs ‚ÄúMoney Longer.‚Äù A video posted by jimjonescapo (@jimjonescapo) on Dec 31, 2016 at 10:20pm PST Subscribe to DX Newsletter Get The Most Important Stories Of The Day Straight To Your Inbox Thank You!
